SpellDef.Description: Summons a Slag or the smaller River Slag.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Slag or the smaller River Slag.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a Cave Bear at the same level as the caster.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Cave Bear.

SpellDef.Description: Summons an Assassin Demon at the same level as the caster.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Assassin Demon.

SpellDef.Description: Sacrifice a champion to transform him into a Death Demon for that battle. The higher level the champion, the more powerful the death demon will be.
A fiery dart strikes for double the caster's level in fire damage. If the unit is killed a Cindercorpse is raised in their place.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: A fiery dart strikes for %d fire damage.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a pack of wolves, bear, naja or panther to aid you in battle.
Summons a Titan from a distant world to fight for five turns.
Raise a skeletal horde from the ruins of Elemental.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Raise a horde of level %d skeletons from the ruins of Elemental.

SpellDef.Description: Raise a Skeleton from the ruins of Elemental. Though weak, a skeleton costs no mana to create.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Raise a level %d Skeleton from the ruins of Elemental.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a level 5 Abomination
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Abomination.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a level 5 (+1 per air shard) Air Elemental. When cast in Tactical all surrounding enemies are knocked prone.
Summons a level 5 Air Elemental and knocks all surrounding enemies prone.
Summons a level 5 (+1 per air shard) Air Elemental. When cast in Tactical all surrounding enemies are knocked prone.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Air Elemental and knocks all surrounding enemies prone.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a level 5 Burning Wraith.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Burning Wraith.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a level 5 Crag Spawn. When cast in Tactical it places mud in all adjacent tiles which reduces Moves to 1.
Summons a level 5 Crag Spawn. When cast in Tactical it places mud in all adjacent tiles which reduces Moves to 1.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Crag Spawn and places mud in all adjacent tiles which reduces Moves to 1.

SpellDef.Description: Summon a level 8 (+1 per death shard) Death Demon.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d Death Demon.

SpellDef.Description: Summon Delin, the Pyre of Men for 3 actions.
Summons a level 5 (+1 per earth shard) Earth Elemental. When cats in Tactical all adjacent enmies take 12 damage.
Summons a level 5 (+1 per earth shard) Earth Elemental. When cats in Tactical all adjacent enmies take 12 damage.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Earth Elemental and does 12 damage to all enemies with 1 tile.

SpellDef.Description: Summon a Familiar. Familiars can cast all the spells your sovereign can.
Summons a level 5 (+1 per fire shard) Fire Elemental. When cast in Tactical all adjacent tiles are set on fire for 5 turns.
Summons a level 5 (+1 per fire shard) Fire Elemental. When cast in Tactical all adjacent tiles are set on fire for 5 turns.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Fire Elemental and sets all adjacent tiles on fire for 5 turns.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a level 5 Grave Elemental. When cast in Tactical all adjacent allied units are provided with a Death Ward for 5 turns.
Summons a level 5 Grave Elemental. When cast in Tactical all adjacent allied units are provided with a Death Ward for 5 turns.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: TXT_SPELL_SUMMONGRAVEELEMENTAL_FORMATDESC

SpellDef.Description: Summons a level 3 (+1 per water shard) Ice Elemental.
Summons a level 3 (+1 per water shard) Ice Elemental.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Ice Elemental.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a level 5 fire breathing Ignys. When cast in Tactical it does 8 fire damage to all adjacent enemies.
Summons a level 5 fire breathing Ignys. When cast in Tactical it does 8 fire damage to all adjacent enemies.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d fire breathing Ignys and does 8 fire damage to all enemies within 1 tile.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a level 5 fire breathing Ignys. When cast in Tactical it does 8 fire damage to all adjacent enemies.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d fire breathing Ignys and does 8 fire damage to all enemies within 1 tile.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a level 5 (+1 per life shard) Lightbringer. When cast in Tactical it blinds all surrounding units, giving them a 25% penalty to Accuracy and Dodge.
Summons a level 5 (+1 per life shard) Lightbringer. When cast in Tactical it blinds all surrounding units, giving them a 25% penalty to Accuracy and Dodge.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Lightbringer and blinds all surrounding units, giving them a 25% penalty to Accuracy and Dodge.

SpellDef.Description: Summon a level 5 Plaguestalker
Summons a level 3 Armored Sentinel and increase the Defense of all surrounding allies by 10.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Armored Sentinel and increase the Defense of all surrounding allies by 10.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a level 1 Shadow Warg.
Summons a level 1 Shadow Warg.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Shadow Warg.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a level 8 Imp of the Titans.
Summons a level 2 (+1 per life shard) Wisp. When cast in Tactical it heals all adjacent allies 8 hit points.
Summons a level 2 (+1 per life shard) Wisp. When cast in Tactical it heals all adjacent allies 8 hit points.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Wisp and heals all adjacent allies 8 hit points.

SpellDef.Description: Does 24 damage (+6 per death shard) to unit. If that unit is killed a Lurk is summoned in its place.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Does %d damage to unit, half if the unit resists. If that unit is killed a Lurk is summoned in its place.
